author: MAURA AJACK / AP
title: South Sudan Becomes the 51st Country in Africa With COVID-19 as It Confirms Its First Case
description: Officials in South Sudan say the country has its first case of COVID-19, making it the 51st of Africa's 54 countries to have the disease.
content:
JUBA, South Sudan — Officials in South Sudan say the country has its first case of COVID-19, making it the 51st of Africa’s 54 countries to have the disease.
First Vice President Riek Machar and the U.N. mission in South Sudan confirmed the case of a U.N. wo… [+1631 chars]
